name: Roulette Royale - Grand Casino
description:
Join Virtual Casino on Roulette Royale with the best designed wheel and friendly tables.

FREE to play. Immediate Bonus Chips.

• Offline European and American Roulette simulator.

• Join Live Multiplayer Tables and Play Tournament Challenges world wide with thousands of players .
